Token.Abstract: Called when the Account manager requires to save the state of an account.

Parameter.Name: userAccount
Parameter.Abstract: The instance of SFUserAccount making the call.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: On output, the error if the return value is NO

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the account was saved properly, NO in case of error

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: On output, the error if the return value is NO

ReturnValue.Abstract: NSDictionary with SFUserAccountIdentity as keys and SFUserAccount as values

Token.Abstract: Allows you to remove the given user account.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Output error parameter, populated if there was an error deleting the account (likely from the filesystem operations).

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the deletion was successful, NO otherwise. Note: If no persisted account matching the user parameter is found, no action will be taken, and deletion will be reported as successful.
